title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'This is a King size Cushion and is quite big than I expected. But comfortable one. Its medium firm and good quality one.  Overall I am happy with it.'

title: 'Best pillow for long sleep'
body: 'This pillow impressed while in unboxing. It is soo soft and also comes with pillow cover. I tried other brands also but it is amazing one.'

title: 'Wonderful product'
body: 'It is wonderful. Extremely comfortable for the neck and back. Used it for the past two nights and woke up the next morning without any uncomfortable neck or shoulder pain. The size of the pillow is perfect for one person to use.'

title: 'Very Sofy and fluffy pillow'
body: 'Very soft and luxurious memory foam pillow which comes with a very premium quality pillow cover the size is perfect for one person and really makes me feel comfortable while sleeping no more neck pain after using this pillowking sized and white colour really looks beautiful'

title: 'Must buy'
body: 'Quality comfort durability all the qualities this product has. It support ur neck and attain its shape again. Value for money product.'

title: 'The best memory foam pillow'
body: 'The brand gives the best product in this price . Totally worth it and value for money and the pillow size is also big .'

title: 'So comfy'
body: 'What a beautiful pillow! With the first use Iâ€™m addicted to using it. My shoulder & neck pain feels a lot better within 3 days of use.'

title: 'Top quality'
body: 'Very comfortable no pain in neck. Good purchase'

title: 'Superb quality'
body: Rec'd this super comfy and soft pillow. Had a good night sleep inspite of my cervical spondylitis pain. Loved it.

title: 'Amazing buy'
body: 'Quality too good. Worth it. orthopedic doctors recommend the pillow for neck and shoulder pain is firm enough to hold the head at a healthy angle but soft enough to alleviate pressure points. Most sleepers succeed with a contoured natural latex foam which offers support and pressure relief.'
